mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item (item_id, item_nm, price, stock_number, item_detail, item_sell_status, reg_time, update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{itemNm}, #{price}, #{stockNumber}, #{itemDetail}, #{itemSellStatus}, #{regTime}, #{updateTime});
mapper.select: SELECT *, item_id AS id FROM item WHERE item_nm = #{itemNm};
SELECT *, item_id AS id FROM item WHERE price < #{price};
